meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inconceivable.
meanings.sent1: The inconceivableness of the vast universe left me in awe.
meanings.sent2: Her story had an air of inconceivableness that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The inconceivableness of a cat wearing a top hat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The inconceivableness of time as a tangible entity puzzled the philosophers.
meanings.sent5: The inconceivableness of the magician's tricks amazed the children.

meanings.definition: The inability to be imagined or understood.
meanings.sent1: The inconceivableness of the concept baffled even the experts.
meanings.sent2: The inconceivableness of the situation made it hard to find a solution.
meanings.sent3: The inconceivableness of a penguin driving a car was a funny thought.
meanings.sent4: The inconceivableness of her success was like a dream come true.
meanings.sent5: The inconceivableness of the technology left everyone speechless.
